title: Best Buy is breaking into the E-bike (and Assembly) world, Bird takes off with new BirdBike
content:
Mega-retailer Best Buy is throwing its weight into e-mobility by offering electric transportation products including scooters, mopeds, and, yes, e-bikes. Products from Unagi, Segway-Ninebot, SUPER73, SWFT and Bird, which recently launched its new retail electric Bird Bike at Eurobike, hit Best Buy stores just as the company headed into Labor Day weekend. author: Mark Wilson
